title: Online Education for Library Information Utilization in Scientific Research

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in academic research and understanding of fundamental information evaluation concepts
context.additional_context: Customized online learning design for science sector professionals, offering flexible asynchronous learning environments

learning_goals: Students can efficiently search for specialized scientific materials in academic databases using three or more search strategies.
Students can systematically store reliable research materials in literature management programs using DOIs, reference tools, etc.
Students can evaluate the credibility of scientific information in the era of information overload based on five criteria: source, author, date, objectivity, and peer review.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
